attributes.title: This app is run by the Chinese government 🧚🏻✨
attributes.review: I’m really confused why trump wants to ban TikTok because this app is evidently run by China. Idk what’s so great about this little troll but all of these Trump slogans seem oddly reminiscent of all the “praise our great leader” crap in countries like China and North Korea. Campaigning? Make it *brainwashing.* I’d take your information and RUN because this app is the antithesis of democracy. Oranges have no place in the White House. 🍊

attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!
attributes.review: I got this app as a fun way to keep up with our President but was SEVERELY disappointed. The opening screen reads a very disgusting quote that I will never repeat. The app then crashed every time I opened it, which seems to be a common problem. You would think the POTUS would know how to make a good app, but the state of this app is not surprising at all. Do not buy!!!

attributes.title: Very bad
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep up with the wonderful leader of the white free world. But once I downloaded it nothing would work. My phone crashed over and over again. Then, my screen just went black and the only thing it would do was play an audio of Donald Trump Screaming PRESIDENTIAL HARASSMENT! Over and over again. I deleted the app as soon as I could. DONT DOWNLOAD!!!

attributes.title: *terrible*
attributes.review: I downloaded this app so that I could stay up to date on everything going on and the app caused my phone to stop working!! Took up so much space, constantly crashed, and now my phone just keeps having the message “Make America Great Again” pop up all over my phone. Do not recommend.

attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!
attributes.review:
I am very disappointed to say the least. This is the worst app I’ve ever encountered. I literally thought it was a spam. It freezes up and takes forever to load. To say the least i thought It was a spam.
You would think this app would be better quality coming from our president.

attributes.title: please help me
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to have a grand old time but unfortunately the opposite happened. as soon as i first opened the app, barron’s beautiful face appeared and he started screaming at me asking him to free him because he was stuck in the app. then, my lights started flickering and a hand pushed through my wall. at first i was like “oh great the demogorgon again” but no it was worse. the creature had the body of a demogorgon but the face of little bunker boy himself. demogorgontrump then peed on me and ate my poor mother. also i now cant stop hearing the echo of melania saying “hello”. in conclusion please help i am motherless and stuck in the app with barron.

attributes.title: oh no 😔🥴
attributes.review: I got this app because I love supporting oranges as one should but it did not work. It took forever to download and i’m talking several days. Then when I opened it I got scared because of the first page that pops up like he was a scary man and no one wants to get scared like that children have phones these days we can’t do that to them.

attributes.title: 🧏🏽‍♀️It made me throw up🧏🏽‍♀️🤷🏽‍♀️
attributes.review: yes i do y’all have any fun with y’all today omg was a time of day that we can do a good thing about it haha was the way he did it because she had no clue how she did that it is so pretty much she was like she was going out and then i is she was supposed to be there she was like she was talking to oeoepo her last night and she told me that she did not want me

attributes.title: 💫 disgusting 💫
attributes.review: first off, i came from tiktok to get this app OFF THE APP STORE because sir orange wants to ban tiktok from the US. and even thought he said that, GEN Z CANNOT BE STOPPED. anyway, for the review. i almost had a heartattack when i first opened the app.. there was a big fat racist/rapist orange standing on the cover with the Us flag behind him. yikes, and they ask for you phone number so i do not recommended 🥰

attributes.title: This app was not good whatsoever
attributes.review: I was exited to download this app and vote for our amazing orange but it took forever to download. The second that I got into the app it was very cluttered and I was confused on what to do from there. Overall this app was not satisfying and I didn’t even get to see a good picture of our orange 🍊✨. This app was slow, cluttered, confusing, and overall bad.
